AbstractBody* _body [protected]

Which body segment.

Point of force application.

Force to be applied.

VectorFunction* _pointFunction [protected]

VectorFunction containing points of force application (t,x,y,z).

VectorFunction* _forceFunction [protected]

VectorFunction containing force to be applied (t,x,y,z).

bool _inputForcesInGlobalFrame [protected]

Flag to set reference frame of input force.

bool _recordAppliedLoads [protected]

Flag to indicate whether or not to record the loads that are applied during an integration.

Recording these loads takes a lot of memory as they are stored every time the derivatives are evaluated (e.g., 6 times per integration step).

Storage* _appliedForceStore [protected]

Storage for the force that was actually applied during the simulation.
